sections.paragraph: + The father of Saul; a Benjamite of the family of Matri. (B.C. 1095.) + Son of Jehiel and uncle to the preceding. (1 Chronicles 9:36) + A Benjamite, great-grandfather of Mordecai. (Esther 2:5) + A Merarite of the house of Mahli, of the tribe of Levi. (1 Chronicles 23:21,22; 24:28,29)
